name: Raw Coconut Cranberry Carrot Cake Cupcakes w_ Macadamia Nut Frosting
description:
Recipes are art.

My HENesis recipeNFT:



Coconut Cranberry Carrot Cake Cupcakes w/a Macadamia Nut Frosting 

For Full Recipe ~ Use QR Code 


Cupcake ingredients:

2 cups of carrot pulp (if using shredded carrots, make sure to squeeze out as much juice as possible w/a paper towel or cheese cloth)
2 cups (~18) pitted medjool dates (soak dates in warm water for >30min to soften)
1 cup coconut chip flakes (or desiccated coconut)
1 cup rolled oats
1 cup walnuts
1/4 cup cranberries (or raisins - more traditional)
1 tsp cinnamon
1/2 tsp cloves
1/2 nutmeg 
1/4 tsp fresh grated ginger
1/4 tsp pink Himalayan salt (any salt will do really)
1 Tbsp chia seeds


Macadamia Nut Frosting Ingredients:

1 cup whole macadamia nuts
1/4 cup almond milk
1/4 cup maple syrup
2 Tbsp coconut oil (soft or liquefied) 
1 tsp vanilla
2 tsp fresh lemon juice
1/2 tsp salt 


Instructions for Cupcakes: 

1. Pulse rolled oats in a food processor to make oats a bit smaller & transfer to bowl.

2. Then add dates to food processor & pulse until a dough ball is formed & dates are smooth. ***NOTE ~ ensure your food processor is high powered; I’ve broken a few food processors that weren’t strong enough to cut through the texture of the sticky dates.

3. Add dates & remaining ingredients to oats and mix until well combined either in a standing mixer or by hand.

4. Line a cupcake pan with plastic wrap & fill with mixture.


Instructions for Frosting: 

1. Blend all ingredients together in food processor until ultra smooth >3 min, adding a bit of extra almond milk if necessary if the mixture isn't cooperating ;)

2. DIY decorative frosting bag - put frosting in a ziplock (really any plastic bag will do).

3. Squeeze frosting into a corner. 

4. Cut the very tip of the corner off - how big you make this hole will dictate how big the line will be when decorating your cupcake.
